title: Scaffolding-Based Nursing Patient Education Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic nursing skills and communication abilities
context.additional_context: Environment where practicing nurses experience VR simulations via smartphones and receive real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Patients can accurately understand and explain nursing education content with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners successfully perform patient education scenarios at least three times using scaffolding strategies (modeling, feedback, and question elicitation).
Learners design and implement education tailored to three levels of patients' health literacy within a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
